name: Avoid Programs with High Fan-Out (EGL)
description:
This rule searches for all the program  having the the sum of call links from child EGL functions to other programs too high.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Program having more than X outgoing call links.
It provides the following information: Program full name, Nb of ougoing call links.
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Try to reduce the call link to other from childs EGL functions to other programs.
